heading: Hello, {{firstName}}!
description: There are a few steps to go through before becoming an investor

unlockOpportunity.title: Access private market investments
unlockOpportunity.description: Complete your investor profile to unlock our exclusive opportunities.

trySimulator.title: Simulate your portfolio
trySimulator.description: You can determine your ideal portfolio based on your goals and risk profile.

disqualifiedPortfolio.title: Thank you for your interest
disqualifiedPortfolio.description: At the moment, we have no investment product that fits your needs. We invite you to check our market insights and latest webinars.

portfolioIndicator.title: Build your personalized portfolio
portfolioIndicator.description: You're on your way to getting your tailored investment strategy.
portfolioIndicator.completedDescription: You're just one step away from getting your tailored investment strategy.

kycIndicator.title: Your proposal is accepted
kycIndicator.keepGoingTitle: You're very close to starting your investment journey with us!
kycIndicator.description: <0>You are just one step away from investing with us. We just need a few more details about you. You can also view the proposal you accepted <1>here.</1></0>
kycIndicator.completedDescription: <0>Thank you for completing the registration process. We are currently processing your information. Your dedicated financial advisor will contact you soon to finalize the process. You can also view the proposal you accepted <1>here.</1></0>

portfolioCompleted.title: We are creating your proposal
portfolioCompleted.description: Your dedicated financial advisor will contact you to discuss it in details.
portfolioCompleted.generatingProposal: You are now ready to generate your proposal

button.talkWithExpert: Talk to our business support team

help.title: We're here to help
help.description: Our business support team is ready to help you

buildProposal.title: Not sure where to start?
buildProposal.description: We will guide you to start your investment journey.

simulatePortfolio.description: <0>Use our quick simulator to see what you could make by investing with <1>The Family Office</1>.</0>
simulatePortfolio.title: Find the right portfolio for you

disclaimer.description: I acknowledge that these opportunities are for information purposes only and do not constitute an offering. Upon the completion of the risk profile and suitability assessment, specific opportunities will be recommended based on your risk appetite.

first.title: Exclusive Opportunities
first.description: Start your digital investment journey by completing your profile to access exclusive private market opportunities.

second.title: Portfolio Simulation
second.description: Simulate your portfolio and receive a personalized proposal by answering questions about your goals and risk tolerance.

third.title: International Partnerships
third.description: Browse our opportunities to uncover private market investments in partnership with top-tier managers like BlackRock, Goldman Sachs and the Carlyle Group.

fourth.title: Latest Webinars
fourth.description: Watch some outstanding figures in the investment world discuss recent and noteworthy market events.

fifth.title: Market Insights
fifth.description: Learn more about private investments, market updates and latest trends in our Insights section.

sixth.title: Support
sixth.description: Get in touch with our business support team for any inquires or help.

modal.cancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel this call? It will be removed from your calendar once confirmed.

error.title: An error occurred while processing your request
